Armor.name: Amber Earrings
Armor.Description: One of the items sold by the Gerudo jeweler. These earrings are made with amber, a gem that harnesses the power of the land to increase defense when equipped.

Armor.name: Ancient Hero's Aspect
Armor.Description: This item is said to contain the spirit of a hero who once saved Hyrule. That hero's aura will envelop the wearer.

Armor.name: Archaic Tunic
Armor.Description: Old-fashioned upper-body wear. It's got some holes, but the soft cloth feels good to the touch. It's hard to keep it wrinkle-free.

Armor.name: Archaic Legwear
Armor.Description: Simple, classic legwear. They're well-worn and showing their age, but they've still got a few good years left in them. It can be a bit cumbersome to have to tie the straps.

Armor.name: Archaic Warm Greaves
Armor.Description: Warm greaves believed to be from a very long time ago. Despite the old look, the heat-retaining material makes it pleasantly resistant to cold temperatures.

Armor.name: Barbarian Helm
Armor.Description: A helmet once worn by the warriors of an ancient warlike tribe from the Faron region.

Armor.name: Barbarian Armor
Armor.Description: Armor once favored by an ancient warlike tribe from the Faron region.

Armor.name: Barbarian Leg Wraps
Armor.Description: Leg wraps once favored by a warlike tribe. The traditional design bolsters your fighting spirit to raise your strength.

Armor.name: Bokoblin Mask
Armor.Description: Kilton's handmade Bokoblin headgear. It's almost charming in a cute, monstrous kind of way... Equip it to blend in with Bokoblins.

Armor.name: Cap of Time
Armor.Description: According to legend, this cap was once worn by a hero who traveled through time. A truly timeless item perfect for kids and adults alike!

Armor.name: Cap of Twilight
Armor.Description: According to legend, this cap was worn by a hero who battled the creatures of twilight.

Armor.name: Cap of the Hero
Armor.Description: According to legend, this cap was once treasured by an ancient hero.

Armor.name: Cap of the Sky
Armor.Description: According to legend, this cap was once worn by a hero who appeared from the sky riding a mighty bird.

Armor.name: Cap of the Wild
Armor.Description: According to legend, this cap was crafted for a hero who travels the wildlands.

Armor.name: Cap of the Wind
Armor.Description: According to legend, this cap was treasured by a hero who sailed the Great Sea.

Armor.name: Cece's Hat
Armor.Description: An avant-garde masterpiece designed by Cece. Guaranteed to make the fashionistas' heads turn.

Armor.name: Champion's Leathers
Armor.Description: This garment, worn by those in good standing with Hyrule royalty, has been reworked with the latest improvements, such as a new shoulder guard.
Armor.PassiveBonus: Grants Link the ability to shoot sword beams with the Master Sword without full health

Armor.name: Charged Headdress
Armor.Description: Used in ancient rituals and made from conductive material, this item produces electricity during thunderstorms.

Armor.name: Charged Shirt
Armor.Description: Used in ancient rituals and made from conductive material, this item produces electricity during thunderstorms.

Armor.name: Charged Trousers
Armor.Description: Used in ancient rituals and made from conductive material, this item produces electricity during thunderstorms.

Armor.name: Climber's Bandana
Armor.Description: This bandanna uses ancient technology that enhances core strength to improve your climbing ability.

Armor.name: Climbing Boots
Armor.Description: The ancient technology used in making this gear and its no-slip glove will make you a better climber.

Armor.name: Climbing Gear
Armor.Description: The special no-slip toes of these boots make you a more efficient climber.

Armor.name: Dark Hood
Armor.Description: Headwear obtained by offering Poes to a strange statue. It resembles the head of a monster born of shadow, and its eyes glow eerie red in the dark.

Armor.name: Dark Trousers
Armor.Description: A tunic obtained by offering Poes to a strange statue. It's a spurious replica of the green outfit once worn by a legendary hero.

Armor.name: Dark Tunic
Armor.Description: Trousers obtained by offering Poes to a strange statue. They look ordinary at first, but on closer inspection, they resemble the legs of a monster born of shadow.

Armor.name: Desert Voe Headband
Armor.Description: Gerudo armor for males. Contains sapphire, which harnesses the power of ice to make the heat more bearable.

Armor.name: Desert Voe Spaulder
Armor.Description: Gerudo armor for males. Contains sapphire, which harnesses the power of ice to make the heat more bearable.

Armor.name: Desert Voe Trousers
Armor.Description: Gerudo trousers for males sold in the Gerudo Secret Club. Sapphire used in their creation offers protection from the heat.

Armor.name: Diamond Circlet
Armor.Description: A Gerudo headpiece set with a diamond, which increases attack power.

Armor.name: Ember Headdress
Armor.Description: Used in ancient rituals, this item is made of heat-absorbing cloth that produces flame in high-temperature environments.

Armor.name: Ember Shirt
Armor.Description: Used in ancient rituals, this item is made of heat-absorbing cloth that produces flame in high-temperature environments.

Armor.name: Ember Trousers
Armor.Description: Used in ancient rituals, this item is made of heat-absorbing cloth that produces flame in high-temperature environments.

Armor.name: Evil Spirit Armor
Armor.Description: Some believe this armor is inspirited by a malevolent entity. It's a rather rare find.

Armor.name: Evil Spirit Greaves
Armor.Description: Some believe these greaves are inspired by a malevolent entity. They're a rather rare find.

Armor.name: Evil Spirit Mask
Armor.Description: Some believe this eerie mask is inspired by a malevolent entity. It's a rather rare find.

Armor.name: Fierce Deity Armor
Armor.Description: Armor worn by the hero from a world in which the moon threatened to fall. Wearing it provides godlike power.

Armor.name: Fierce Deity Boots
Armor.Description: Boots worn by a hero from a world in which the moon threatened to fall. Wearing them provides godlike power.

Armor.name: Fierce Deity Mask
Armor.Description: A mask worn by a hero from a world in which the moon was falling, granting godlike power.

Armor.name: Flamebreaker Armor
Armor.Description: Fire-resistant armor crafted by Gorons for Hylians curious enough to visit Goron City.

Armor.name: Flamebreaker Boots
Armor.Description: Goron artisans used flame-resistant rocks to craft these fireproof boots for Hylians visiting Goron City.

Armor.name: Flamebreaker Helm
Armor.Description: Stone headgear made for tourists by Goron crafters. Not only is it flame-resistant, but it also covers your entire head.

Armor.name: Froggy Hood
Armor.Description: A good hood for a rainy day. The perfectly weighted headband keeps the Wearer focus and stabilized, making it easier to climb wet, slippery surfaces.

Armor.name: Froggy Leggings
Armor.Description: Good leggings for a rainy day. The feet are covered in small dimples and fed with an anti-slip substance, giving them great traction on wet, slippery surfaces.

Armor.name: Froggy Sleeve
Armor.Description: A good sleeve for a rainy day. Small dimples on the fingers act as suction cups, giving good grip on wet, slippery surfaces.

Armor.name: Frostbite Headdress
Armor.Description: Used in ancient rituals, this item's cold-absorbing cloth produces frost in low-temperature environments.

Armor.name: Frostbite Shirt
Armor.Description: Used in ancient rituals, this item's cold-absorbing cloth produces frost in low-temperature environments.

Armor.name: Frostbite Trousers
Armor.Description: Used in ancient rituals, this item's cold-absorbing cloth produces frost in low-temperature environments.

Armor.name: Gaiters of the Depths
Armor.Description: Gaiters acquired by offering Poes to a strange statue found in the Depths. They offer some resistance to gloom.

Armor.name: Glide Mask
Armor.Description: A mask with a wind-resistant design that allows for steadier gliding while the wearer plummets from the sky.

Armor.name: Glide Shirt
Armor.Description: The cloth sewn to this shirt helps it "catch" air, increasing the wearer's ability to glide while they plummet from the sky.

Armor.name: Glide Tights
Armor.Description: The cloth sewn to these tights allows their wearer to glide more easily as they plummet from the sky.

Armor.name: Hood of the Depths
Armor.Description: A hood acquired by offering Poes to a strange statue found in the Depths. It offers some resistance to gloom.

Armor.name: Horriblin Mask
Armor.Description: Kilton's handmade Horriblin headgear. The big nose and smiley mouth look just like those of the real monster...

Armor.name: Hylian Hood
Armor.Description: A hood woven using traditional Hyrulean methods, made from sturdy material.

Armor.name: Hylian Trousers
Armor.Description: These trousers are common throughout the Hyrule region. The soft fabric makes them quite comfortable.

Armor.name: Hylian Tunic
Armor.Description: A common garb popular in Hyrule, especially among travelers. Its light-yet-sturdy fabric doesn't limit movement.

Armor.name: Korok Mask
Armor.Description: A mask inspired by those fun-loving Koroks. It shakes when one is nearby. It's a rather rare find.

Armor.name: Lightning Helm
Armor.Description: The Yiga copied a precious heirloom passed down among the Gerudo for this helm. Adorned with topaz, it deflects lightning.

Armor.name: Lizalfos Mask
Armor.Description: Kilton's handmade Lizalfos headgear. It's designed to replicate even the goggling eyeballs of the Lizalfos.

Armor.name: Lobster Shirt
Armor.Description: A soft, comfortable shirt traditional to a southern island. It's made of breathable fabric, so it's well-suited to warm regions.

Armor.name: Lynel Mask
Armor.Description: Kilton's handmade Lynel headgear. It's so well-crafted that it can deceive a real Lynel.

Armor.name: Majora's Mask
Armor.Description: An eerie mask passed down from ancient times. Wearing it makes it harder for certain enemies to spot you. It's a rather rare find.

Armor.name: Mask of Awakening
Armor.Description: Legend says this mask resembles a hero who explored a mysterious place that one could visit but not leave.

Armor.name: Midna's Helmet
Armor.Description: A helmet much like the one Midna wore when she fought alongside the Hero of Twilight. It's a rather rare find.

Armor.name: Miner's Mask
Armor.Description: A mask used for working in darkness. The attached lamps are filled with bioluminescent material to light one's surroundings.

Armor.name: Miner's Top
Armor.Description: A shirt featuring lamps of various sizes filled with bioluminescent material. Made to help with excavating dark environments.

Armor.name: Miner's Trousers
Armor.Description: The bioluminescent lamps on these trousers shed light on where you step. They come in handy when walking in darkness.

Armor.name: Moblin Mask
Armor.Description: Kilton's handmade Moblin headgear. It's designed to replicate the distinct, long, Moblin nose and hanging tongue.

Armor.name: Mystic Headpiece
Armor.Description: Headgear acquired in exchange for Bubbul gems. Made with prayers spirits, it protects the wear allowing them to lose rupees instead of health when hit.

Armor.name: Mystic Robe
Armor.Description: A robe acquired in exchange for, Bubbul gems. Woven with prayers to spirits, it protects the wearer, allowing them to lose rupees instead of health when hit.

Armor.name: Mystic Trousers
Armor.Description: Trousers acquired in exchange for Bubbul gems. Each thread is blessed by spirits, protecting the wearer by allowig them to lose rupees instead of health when hit.

Armor.name: Opal Earrings
Armor.Description: Earrings containing opal, a gem that harnesses the power of water to increase your swimming speed.

Armor.name: Phantom Armor
Armor.Description: Myths abound about armored phantoms that terrorized brave heroes. This piece looks just like the armor they allegedly wore. It's a rather rare find.

Armor.name: Phantom Greaves
Armor.Description: Myths abound about armored phantoms that terrorized brave heroes. These greaves look just like the ones they supposedly wore. They're a rather rare find.

Armor.name: Phantom Helmet
Armor.Description: Myths abound about armored phantoms that terrorized brave heroes. This helmet looks just like the ones they supposedly wore. It's a rather rare find.

Armor.name: Radiant Mask
Armor.Description: A mask made from crushed luminous stones that gives off a radiant glow in the dark.

Armor.name: Radiant Shirt
Armor.Description: A shirt that glows in the dark due to dye made from luminous stones.

Armor.name: Radiant Tights
Armor.Description: Paint made from crushed luminous stones causes these tights to glow in the dark.

Armor.name: Ravio's Hood
Armor.Description: The hood of a traveling merchant who had a bracelet that could turn the wearer into a painting. Wearing it increases your sideways climbing speed. It's a rather rare find.

Armor.name: Royal Guard Boots
Armor.Description: These boots are part of the uniform for Hyrule's royal guard. They're a fine blend of style and function.

Armor.name: Royal Guard Cap
Armor.Description: This spiffy cap is part of the uniform for Hyrule's royal guard. It's lighter than it looks and easy to move around in.

Armor.name: Royal Guard Uniform
Armor.Description: The dignified uniform for Hyrule's royal guard. It's made of high-quality materials and is both stylish and practical.

Armor.name: Rubber Armor
Armor.Description: This armor owes its electricity resistance to an ancient material called "rubber," which is nearly impossible to find.

Armor.name: Rubber Helm
Armor.Description: An electricity-resistant helmet made from an ancient material called "rubber."

Armor.name: Rubber Tights
Armor.Description: These invaluable tights are resistant to electricity. They're made with an ancient technology called "rubber."

Armor.name: Ruby Circlet
Armor.Description: A traditional Gerudo headpiece set with a ruby, which uses the power of fire to make the cold more bearable.

Armor.name: Sand Boots
Armor.Description: These Gerudo-made boots evenly distribute your weight so you can maintain your normal movement speed on sand.

Armor.name: Sapphire Circlet
Armor.Description: A Gerudo headpiece set with a sapphire, which harnesses the power of ice to make the heat more bearable.

Armor.name: Sheik's Mask
Armor.Description: A mask said to have been worn by a Sheikah who saved a time-traveling hero. Ideal for undercover work.

Armor.name: Snow Boots
Armor.Description: These boots distribute your body weight so you can maintain your normal movement speed on deep snow.

Armor.name: Snowquill Headdress
Armor.Description: A Rito accessory made from snow-bird feathers. Adorned with a gem that harnesses the power of fire.

Armor.name: Snowquill Tunic
Armor.Description: Made by Rito artisans, this tunic stacks molted Rito feathers in each layer to help retain body heat.

Armor.name: Snowquill Trousers
Armor.Description: The Rito feathers that line these trousers make them excellent at retaining body heat.

Armor.name: Soldier's Armor
Armor.Description: Hyrulean guards praised this sturdy armor for its superior defense. Its craftsmanship is obvious.

Armor.name: Soldier's Greaves
Armor.Description: Greaves favored by Hyrulean guards. They owe their distinctly high defense to the metal plates they're made from.

Armor.name: Soldier's Helm
Armor.Description: Sturdy headgear for protecting frontline soldiers from vicious monsters. Praised for its superior defense.

Armor.name: Stealth Chest Guard
Armor.Description: Armor designed for stealth, passed down through the Sheikah tribe. Its special fabric suppresses sound.

Armor.name: Stealth Mask
Armor.Description: A Sheikah-made mask that suppresses the noisy rustling of clothes. Perfect for sneaking about.

Armor.name: Stealth Tights
Armor.Description: Tights crafted by the Sheikah, laced with ancient technology that suppresses the noisy rustling of clothes.

Armor.name: Tingle's Hood
Armor.Description: There was once a man who claimed to be the very reincarnation of a fairy. He treasured this hood, and so will you. After all, it's a rather rare find. Kooloo-Limpah.

Armor.name: Tingle's Shirt
Armor.Description: There was once a man who claimed to be the very reincarnation of a fairy. He treasured this shirt, and so will you. After all, it's a rather rare find. Kooloo-Limpah.

Armor.name: Tingle's Tights
Armor.Description: There was once a man who claimed to be the very reincarnation of a fairy. He treasured these tights, and so will you. After all, they're a rather rare find. Kooloo-Limpah.

Armor.name: Topaz Earrings
Armor.Description: Earrings made with topaz, which harnesses the power of lightning to increase electricity resistance.

Armor.name: Trousers of Awakening
Armor.Description: Legend says these trousers were worn by a hero who explored a mysterious island that one could visit but not leave.

Armor.name: Trousers of Time
Armor.Description: Legends say these trousers were once worn by a hero who traveled through time.

Armor.name: Trousers of Twilight
Armor.Description: Legends say these trousers were once worn by a hero who battled the beasts of twilight.

Armor.name: Trousers of the Hero
Armor.Description: Legends say these trousers were favored by a hero from an ancient age.

Armor.name: Trousers of the Sky
Armor.Description: Legends say these trousers were once worn by a hero who appeared from the sky riding a mighty bird.

Armor.name: Trousers of the Wild
Armor.Description: Legends say these trousers were tailored for a hero who travels the wilderness.

Armor.name: Trousers of the Wind
Armor.Description: Legends say these trousers were once cherished by a hero who sailed the Great Sea.

Armor.name: Tunic of Awakening
Armor.Description: Legend says this armor was worn by a hero who explored a mysterious area that one could visit but not leave.

Armor.name: Tunic of Memories
Armor.Description: In ancient Hyrule, only those respected by the royal family could wear this garment.

Armor.name: Tunic of Time
Armor.Description: Legend has it this armor was worn by a hero who traveled through time. It can be worn by a child or an adult.

Armor.name: Tunic of Twilight
Armor.Description: Legend has it this armor was worn by a hero who battled monsters of twilight.

Armor.name: Tunic of the Depths
Armor.Description: A tunic acquired by offering Poes to a strange statue found in the Depths. It offers some resistance to gloom.

Armor.name: Tunic of the Hero
Armor.Description: Legend has it this armor was once cherished by a hero from ancient times.

Armor.name: Tunic of the Sky
Armor.Description: Legend has it this armor was worn by a hero who rode a mighty bird. It was apparently presented after a ceremonious event.

Armor.name: Tunic of the Wild
Armor.Description: This armor was apparently crafted for a hero who travels the wilds. Interestingly, it's just your size.

Armor.name: Tunic of the Wind
Armor.Description: Legend has it this armor was worn by a hero who sailed the Great Sea. It was woven with love by his grandmother.

Armor.name: Vah Medoh Divine Helm
Armor.Description: A helm said to deepen the bond with the Rito when worn by a Hylian.

Armor.name: Vah Naboris Divine Helm
Armor.Description: A helm said to deepen the bond with the Gerudo when worn by a Hylian.

Armor.name: Vah Rudania Divine Helm
Armor.Description: A helm said to deepen the bond with the Gorons when worn by a Hylian.

Armor.name: Vah Ruta Divine Helm
Armor.Description: A helm said to deepen the bond with the Zora when worn by a Hylian.

Armor.name: Well-Worn Hair Band
Armor.Description: An old, worn, simple hair band. Its color has long faded, but it still has someliife left in it.

Armor.name: Yiga Armor
Armor.Description: Armor supplied to members of the Yiga Clan. Defensive parts are minimized for silence, so it's lacking in protection.

Armor.name: Yiga Mask
Armor.Description: A mask supplied to members of the Yiga Clan. It covers the entire face, keeping even breath sounds to a minimum. Perfect sneaking, but lacks protection due to its light material.

Armor.name: Yiga Tights
Armor.Description: Tights supplied to members of the Yiga Clan. The soft material on the soles silences footsteps, but protection is lacking due to the light material.

Armor.name: Zant's Helmet
Armor.Description: The ruthless Usurper King of the Twilight Realm wore a helmet much like this one. It's a rather rare find.

Armor.name: Zonaite Helm
Armor.Description: A helmet forged of zonaite. The magic infused into it during its production grants its weare improved energy efficiency for Zonai devices.

Armor.name: Zonaite Shin Guards
Armor.Description: Shin guards forged of zonaite. Wearing them awakens the magic of their creators, improving efficiency for Zonai devices.

Armor.name: Zonaite Waistguard
Armor.Description: A waistguard made from zonait hile wearing it, you'll reap the benefit of its imbued magic and improve the effieiency of Zonai devices.

Armor.name: Zora Armor
Armor.Description: Armor crafted by a past Zora princess for her future husband. Equip it to swim up waterfalls.

Armor.name: Zora Greaves
Armor.Description: These greaves have been passed down among the Zora for generations. Equip them to swim faster.

Armor.name: Zora Helm
Armor.Description: Zora headgear made from dragon scales. Increases swimming speed and allows you to spin to attack while swimming.
